text: 4.3 Apo 17.30, Epe 2.2-3, 4.17, Tat 3.3 Nɨbi ned binɨb God nop kɨdek ma gɨpal okok pel gos nɨŋɨd nɨgelɨgɨpal tek gelɨgɨpɨm. Sɨkol won olap mel, pelpel gelɨgɨpɨm. Nɨm anɨb ak tek. Tap si tap tɨmel okok monmon yɨbɨl gɨl, gos tɨmel nɨŋɨd mapen tɨkjakek gelɨgɨpɨm. Ñɨg kɨles ñɨbɨl sawl lɨl, tap nɨgep ma nɨgep gɨl, monmon yɨbɨl gelɨgɨpɨm. Tap yepɨs agnɨgep okok agnɨŋɨd, nebeŋ ma delɨgɨpɨm.
